description: Earthy Jerusalem artichokes make a rich and hearty soup impressive enough for a dinner party entree.
keywords: Vegetable soup,Seafood free,Wheat free,Egg free,Sesame free
name: Hearty Jerusalem Artichoke Soup Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1L chicken stock, hot, made with 2 stock cubes

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the butter in a large, deep pan and cook the onions and artichokes for 10 minutes until soft. Add the garlic and cook for 2 minutes.
Pour over the stock, bring to the boil, reduce the heat and simmer for 15 minutes. Pour into a food processor, add the cream and blend until smooth.
